transcripts.text: The issue of fear came up.  And let me, I'll just ask it straight out.  Were you fearful?  Because a lot of people said, boy, the officers showed some restraint, but my goodness, it could have gone the wrong way.  Your response to that?

And my response to this is the same thing I keep telling them on Facebook.  They are absolutely right.  You guys are absolutely right.  It could have went all the way left.  Through the grace of God, it did.  And guess why?  That's because I know my right facts.  When you know something, you can't do nothing.  Sometimes people can't do nothing but accept something, and that's what they have to do.  Y'all have to accept the fact that I knew what I was talking about, period.  Period.  Was I fearful for my life?  Yes.  Am I still fearful for my life?  Yes.  This is a dangerous game that I'm playing.  People get mad when they look stupid.  I got these cops all over the world looking crazy.  Looking crazy.  Looking crazy.  Looking like they tuck their tail.  Yes, I'm afraid for my life.  Will I still stand up for myself?  You damn right.  Every time.
